programme.title: Changes to the American Family
programme.short_synopsis: An examination of the changes to the structure of the American family since 1960.
programme.medium_synopsis: A summary of how the American family has changed in the past 30 years and an explanation of why the prevalence of the microwave is a great indicator of the transformation.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
